EmailTemplate.name: Global_Content Syndication_MigratingOracleToGPonAWS_WP_Q217.Confirmation - Migra
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading our white paper!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading the Migrating Oracle Analytical Workloads to Pivotal Greenplum® on the AWS Marketplace white paper. We hope you found it informative and helpful.
Given your interest in this white paper, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Shaping the Future of Data Warehousing through Open Source Software <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/shaping-the-future-of-data-warehousing-through-open-source-software]]> - White Paper: Pivotal Greenplum 5: The Next-Generation Data Platform <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-greenplum-5-the-next-generation-data-platform]]> - Webinar: Cloud-Native Data: What Data Questions to Ask When Building Cloud-Native Apps <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/mar-15-cloud-native-data-what-data-questions-to-ask-when-building-cloud-native-apps-webinar]]> - White Paper: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation-white-paper]]> - Webinar Replay: The Data Warehouse in the Age of Digital Transformation <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/the-data-warehouse-in-the-age-of-digital-transformation]]> - Case Study: Aridhia - Creating a Platform to Power the Next Generation of Clinical and Translational Informatics <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/aridhia]]> - Case Study: O’Reilly Media - Enabling Rapid Analysis of Huge Quantities of Data <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum/oreilly]]> - Community Video: Learn about the Greenplum Database <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Sn971CLnTxI]]> - Learn More: Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum]]> - Download: Greenplum Sandbox <[[http://greenplum.org/]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team For more on everything from Spring to cloud-native to accelerating your application development and more, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]>, taking place this September 24-27th in Washington, D.C. Use code S1P_Discount_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-confirmation-discount-2018]]> and save $100 off the price of admission.
